com.github.wuic.util

Class NumberUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.util.NumberUtils

extends Object

      • isNumber

        public static Boolean isNumber(String candidate)

        Checks if the given String if a number (i.e eventually begins with '-' symbol and followed by digits).

        Parameters:
        candidate - the String to test
        Returns:
        true if the String is a number, false otherwise
